body: Hey guys, my brother Cooper recently made a Minecraft account, and decided to join us on Avicus! His username is coop_the_cat, so if you see him in game, you know who he is. He just turned nine, but he still has trouble reading/writing. He's slowly getting better, however. So if you try to talk to him and his spelling/grammar accuracy isn't the best, that's why. But anyway guys, just figured I'd let you in on that. I hope he gets as much enjoyment out of Avicus as I do. <3

title: Welcome my brother to the server!
